item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

STELLA BLUES

Happy Hour Specials:
$1 off draft beer
$1 off house wine


*We will be doing a special holiday drive this week.*

Tis the season of giving, and I thought that it would be nice for the NHC to remember the often forgotten but always loved four-legged creatures in the world. A volunteer organization known as Presents for Paws is sponsoring a holiday drive for Connecticut animal shelters. Items donated will be given to animal shelters all throughout the state to help feed and care for strays as they await adoption. Please bring anything you care to donate to happy hour and I'll drop off the NHC donations the following day.

Wish List:
Unopened wet/dry dog food
Unopened wet/dry cat food
Dog toys
Cat toys
Cat beds
Leashes and Collars
Cat Litter
New or gently used towels and blankets



Contact: Jeanie (860) 942-4708

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Stella Blues
